raw_body: . In the arms of Jesus. Beloved wife of late Shirley Basnayake, loving mother of Sonali and Sanjay, mother-in-law of Pastor Viraj Perera and Germaine, precious grandmother of Angelo and Esther (New Zealand), loving sister of late Eustace, Danny, Maurice, Tita, Rita and late George. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour, Borella on Friday, 12th January from 9.00 a.m. onwa
